ComicInfo.Summary:
When the master of disguise Proteus frames the Creeper for murder, the real Creeper must track him down.
Proteus frames the Creeper when he kills a news anchor right on television at WHAM TV and in front of the Creeper's alias Jack Ryder. The story is a mystery as the Creeper tries to track him down. With Proteus being a shapeshifter neither the Creeper or Jack Ryder know if the are talking to the real person or not. To make matters worse Proteus does not hesitate to murder anyone who is unloyal leaving anyone who might talk dead and leaving the Creeper with more questions than answers. This overall story will continue till the end of the series in issue six.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/beware-the-creeper-2-the-many-faces-of-proteus/4000-156870/
ComicInfo.Tags: Creeper,WHAM TV Building,WHAM TV Crew,Vera Sweet,Legs Larson,Bill Brane,Proteus (Cord)
ComicInfo.Title: The Many Faces of Proteus
